Posts.Content: Sorry, 3 weeks ago I found a lump and went to my doctor, she decided to send me to the hosp, I waited 2 weeks for that appointment to arrive. So on my arrival at the hosp, they checked me over and said that they would bump me up the waiting list and that could be three weeks from today, for a mammogram, scan, and biopsy, I was not happy I thought that they were going to do it today, and that was what I was there for. That was what my doctor had told me. Can't believe I have to wait another three weeks for my tests, then another weeks before I get results, then Christmas and public holidays it before be a while before l hear any news.
Posts.Title: I'll be grey ....... By the time I get my tests

Posts.Content:
God I'm so worried, I found a hard lump about
 a month ago, it's about
 the size of a Ping pong ball, visited the doctor who sent me to the hosp. Yesterday was my appointment, and I thought I was going to have the triple three test, only to be told they had bumped me up the list and I would get my appointment in around three weeks. .... Omg can't believe I have to wait another three weeks.
Posts.Title: I'll be grey ....... By the time I get my tests

Posts.Content:
Geraldine, 
42 yrs
New Zealand 
Lump found 2013
